summary.span: 建立 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 元素的佈景主題特定外觀。

span.span: Creates the theme-specific look for Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) elements.

summary.span: 會定義 和 項目的外觀。

span.span: A defines the appearance of and elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實際的外觀取決於哪一個佈景主題為作用中使用者的系統上。The actual appearance of the is dependent on which theme is active on the user's system. 這個類別的屬性可讓[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)]設定根據目前的佈景主題的外觀。The properties of this class allow [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] to set the appearance based on the current theme. 在 XAML 用法物件項目也可以有子內容，可以是單一，設定屬性。In XAML usage, a object element can also have child content, which can be a single that sets the property. ## XAML 物件項目用法XAML Object Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values `theme:` Xmlns 前置詞CLR 命名空間。An xmlns prefix for the CLR namespace. 一般而言，xmlns 前置詞和對應的定義 （未顯示） 的 XAML 根項目。Typically, xmlns prefixes and mappings are defined in a XAML root element (not shown).

span.span: if the is checked; if the is not checked; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性時，才適用已或。This property only applies when the is a or . 如果項目符號使用的物件支援`IsThreeState`屬性，且該屬性的值是`true`，然後針對`null`潛在使用者可加以設定。If the object used for the bullet supports an `IsThreeState` property, and the value of that property is `true`, then a value of `null` is potentially user-settable. 否則的值不能設為`null`由使用者動作，但它可以設定標記或程式碼中的該方式。Otherwise, the value of cannot be set to `null` by user action, but it can be set that way in markup or code. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`| （不過，設定這個屬性可能不會在所有佈景主題） (however, this property might not be set in all themes)| ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```
